seo.metaDescription: Join us for the ultimate Easter Egg Hunt at GreenLand Village! Bring your baskets and hunt for over 5,000 eggs filled with treats and surprises. Fun for the whole family!
seo.keywords: easter egg hunt parkland florida, family easter event, kids easter activities, greenland village events

sections.headline: Easter Egg Hunt
sections.subheadline: The Biggest Egg Hunt in Parkland!
sections.description: Join us for an egg-citing adventure at GreenLand Village! Over 5,000 eggs hidden across our beautiful grounds, filled with candy, toys, and special golden egg prizes!

sections.title: Event Information
sections.description: Arrive early to check in and receive your egg basket. The hunt begins promptly at 10:30 AM! Different hunt areas for ages 0-3, 4-7, and 8-12.

sections.title: What to Expect
sections.subtitle: A day packed with Easter fun for the whole family!

cards.title: 5,000+ Eggs
cards.description: Hunt for eggs filled with candy, toys, and special prizes

cards.title: Meet the Easter Bunny
cards.description: Photo opportunities with our special guest!

cards.title: Egg Decorating
cards.description: Create your own masterpiece at our craft station

sections.title: Age-Appropriate Hunt Zones
sections.description: We've designed three separate hunting areas to ensure every child has a fair and fun experience. Toddlers won't compete with older kids, and everyone goes home with plenty of eggs!

features.text: Bunny Meadow: Ages 0-3 (easy finds, soft grass)
Golden eggs in each zone win special prizes!

cards.title: Easter Basket
cards.description: Bring your own or purchase one at the event

cards.title: Comfortable Shoes
cards.description: You'll be walking on grass and trails

cards.title: Sunscreen & Hats
cards.description: It's Florida - protect from the sun!

sections.title: Reserve Your Spot
sections.description: Space is limited! Sign up now to secure your family's spot at the biggest Easter Egg Hunt in Parkland.
sections.successMessage: Check your email for confirmation and event details. We can't wait to see you!
